messages.title: There is a stark choice at this election
messages.content: Between Labour's plan to improve living standards of families and communities and the Tories who have caused the cost of living crisis and will bring further cuts to our public services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has a plan to restore faith in politics.
We will give all young people an apprenticeship.
We will extend free childcare to 3 & 4 year olds.

mentions.candidate: Make sure you are registered to vote at this election, your vote really matters - Rachael Maskell

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Resident, I am honoured to be standing as your prospective Labour candidate...

endorsements.endorsement: Former MP for York Central, standing down at this election, enthusiastically endorsing Rachael Maskell
NHS worker who talks about the importance of the NHS and the need to get a real person like Rachael Maskell who understands these issues
Resident talking about the engagement with voters and that Rachael Maskell is hardworking and will engage local people
Residents describing Rachael Maskell as passionate about building a sustainable city

leaflet.additionalNotes: Best wishes, Rachael Maskell Labour's Parliamentary Candidate - York Central
